participant_1.name: Elena
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and hardworking, Elena loves the thrill of racing her motorbike and often finds joy in her day-off activities.
participant_1.background: my main transportation is my motorbike. its red with blue stripe so it shiny when i race. i waitress during the day to supplement my income. i've light skin with big brown eyes.

participant_2.name: Carlos
participant_2.personality: Carlos is easygoing and sociable, enjoying the simple pleasures in life like cleaning and watching races.
participant_2.background: i'm a construction worker. in my free time i like to watch nascar racing and ufc. i have been working since i was sixteen years old. my favorite food is mexican food.

content.text:
Buongiorno! Such a nice day! How are you?.
Short bio: transportation is my motorbike
I'm fine, thanks you! And how are you doing?
oh feeling good . my house is sparkling clean . love cleaning. where are you from ?
I'm from Spain and my favorite food is mexican food. What is your favorite food?
yes actually i like it a lot . hows it going today ?
All cool! Today I have a day off. in my free time i like to watch nascar racing and ufc. What do you do in your free time?
shopping , like to go fishing also. Also, try to guess: i've light skin ...
Do you have a job?
with big brown eyes, funny you :)
I mean if you go to work
yeah i know what you mean
so do you have a job?
i work in publishing , really just a glorified secretary . why is it about to be busy ?
i'm a construction worker. I had a lot of different jobs during my lifetime. i have been working since i was sixteen years old.
cool . i'm still in school , but i do a lot of stuff with music . ðŸ™Š
Do you pllay any instruments?
i can play a piano but i want to relax on this day. how is your day going ?

I woke up recently and the weather outside is stuffy
 so I had to go to bath and now I'm here
do you have a job
yeah i'm a construction worker as I have already said
what city are you from ?
Molokovoz
I don't understand you ðŸ™ˆ. how old are you ?
